Reviews.Title: Not good laptop
Reviews.Author: my nguyen
Reviews.Content: i won't recomment for my friend or leave my feed back about this laptop. I have bought it since 2 months , and there is something wrong with a battery which went off so so fast . A full battery charge could last only 40 minutes or less , so mad about that. Well, it was an accident bought it , what can i do :(((
